text: If you have a contact with multiple associations, and these associations can be added/edited via forms. How do you choose which association record gets changed? For example I have 1 contact with 2 pets associated. I have a form with contact email and pet name field. How do I choose the Pet that is being changed? Can I add a record ID field to the form, to make sure we overwrite that Pet custom record? (It's more related to forms, but this seemed the best channel to ask it)
Currently the only way I see this possible, is to use Contact records, and copy over the record ID in a custom field, that we use to load in the data into the right association
Hello, can anyone tell me how I can flush the retry because of rate-limiting queue on a custom code workflow please ? thanks
I'm trying to stop it from retrying on many instances, but I don't know how to do so
Okay, I succeeded to do so by putting unenrollement conditions
Yeah to flush the queue you need to shut the workflow off and turn it back on but that's only in cases where it's an emergency. The unenrollments is definitely the best way
